function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Team members' health is a priority","Impact":"Risk of virus exposure and transmission within the organization","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide training on virus prevention","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing applications","People":"Team members, their families, and communities","Owner":"Management and leadership"},{"Description":"Impact on day-to-day operations","Impact":"Disruption of business operations and customer service","Mitigation":"Implement remote work policies, contingency planning for staff shortages","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, workforce management software","People":"Employees, customers, and stakeholders","Owner":"Management and leadership"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency and communication","Impact":"Decreased trust and morale among team members","Mitigation":"Regular communication, honest and transparent updates, access to accurate information","Technologies":"Internal communication platforms, virtual town hall meetings","People":"Team members and management","Owner":"Leadership and communication team"}]}
